content.value: Like many other UTSC student organizations, Blankets for Toronto offers membership to University of Toronto students. Most importantly, obtaining membership is not required at all to get involved with our organization. The vast majority of events that we hold will be open to all individuals, regardless of membership status.

Membership fees collected will go towards funding future Blankets for Toronto initiatives, helping to purchase additional blankets and food for distribution. Members may be eligible for discounts to participate in paid events, if applicable. Additionally, members may also from time to time be exclusively eligible for giveaways.

Students wishing to join BTO as a member should stay updated with our organization, as we typically process new members near the start of every study term at UTSC. If you are unable to find a suitable time to apply, feel free to contact us and we may be able to schedule a time!
